lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said the plan would be part of a series of projects including new air and rail terminals that he called “the biggest construction program in our state’s history.”

byline.original: By CHARLES V. BAGLI and EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS

headline.print_headline: Cuomo Lays Out Renovation Plan for Penn Station and Post Office Building
headline.main: Cuomo Lays Out Renovation Plan for Penn Station and Farley Post Office

snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said the plan would be part of a series of projects including new air and rail terminals that he called “the biggest construction program in our state’s history.”
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo details plans for renovation of Pennsylvania Station in Manhattan, along with construction of adjunct train and retail hub across street, during press conference at Madison Square Garden; plans are one component of package of plans for improving infrastructure across state.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Farley, James A, General Post Office (Manhattan, NY)
